TextView.android:text:
StoryGame is a game based on StoryCubes.
You have to create a story with the words that are shown. These words are generated randomly.
ou can interpret the words in any way you like, that's what's so nice about the game.
Furthermore, every story is correct!
You can play the game in any way you like; You can make a story individually, but in a group you can also choose to let everyone add something to the story.
